attributes.action: A petition to let schools run a specific club regarding lgbtq+ and allies.
attributes.additional_details: I want this done becuase in alot of schools they have alot of homophobia but with this club we can change that and help those who are struggling to find who they really are. In abbywood and patchway they already have one of these clubs however bscs does not and we want to change that. It will be voluntary and we will social distance outside if it's a nice day but inside if not.
attributes.background: I want in every school to have a lgbtq+and allies club so that's it's a safe place for lgbtq+ people to understand the community better and let no hate stop people being who they want to be

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  This is a matter for individuals schools and students.
